cells.data:
Used existing illustrator file of Farmers logo. Save this file as an .svg.

Import this file into blender.



Selected curve section on menu and set extrude there. Found that standard extrusion command did not work and Solidify  modifier had uneven results. Also notice that none of the colors were imported. Had to do that after the import. Settings for extrude are below:
